Flub.Name: Duration
Flub.Description: Duration of the thermal erosion process.

Flub.Name: Strength
Flub.Description: Strength of the thermal erosion process.

Flub.Name: Anisotropy
Flub.Description: Thermal erosion's anisotropy that affects how rock is affected, and deposits formed. See the Anisotropy section for details.

Flub.Name: Talus Settling
Flub.Description: Settling of sediments in the talus.

Flub.Name: Sediment Removal
Flub.Description: Amount of sediment to be removed.

Flub.Name: Fine Detail
Flub.Description: Enable rocky debris in the talus.

Flub.Name: Debris Size
Flub.Description: Size of the rocky debris in the talus. Available when Fine Detail is turned On

Flub.Name: Real Scale
Flub.Description: Use the scale defined in the terrain. Disable to access addtional options and modify erosion's physics.

Flub.Name: Terrain Scale
Flub.Description: Scale of the terrain. Available when Real Scale is turned Off

Flub.Name: Feature Scale
Flub.Description: Scale of the largest feature in the terrain.

Flub.Name: Verticality
Flub.Description: Height of the terrain.Available when Real Scale is turned Off
